bug.author: nsubiron
bug.summary: Nissan Micra slightly turning left when going forward
bug.description:
The Nissan Micra has a hard time following the road straight, to reproduce just play using the Micra as player and spawn in some long straight street, press forward and eventually it goes to the other lane. Following from <denchmark-link:https://github.com/carla-simulator/carla/issues/384>#384</denchmark-link> . See these two videos <denchmark-link:https://youtu.be/mDUUeI__Q0Y>NissanMica</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://youtu.be/6grCkr3hq_o>Mustang</denchmark-link>
It would be nice too to check other vehicles.
